rules_text:
First strike
[i]House Keeping[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each token you control.
[i]Live to Serve[/i] – Whenever Jakob, Duty Calls attacks, you may put a lifelink or deathtouch counter onto up to one other target creature you control.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {W}{B}
